name: Batman
powers_short: Unlike most superheroes, Batman does not possess any superpowers; rather, he relies on his genius intellect, physical prowess, martial arts abilities, detective skills, science and technology, vast wealth, intimidation, and indomitable will.

name: Wonder Woman
occupation: Emissary to the world of Man, Protector of Paradise Island; former Goddess of Truth
powers_short: Divine Empowerment,Superhuman Strength,Superhuman Durability,Flight,Enhanced Healing Factor,Enhanced Senses,Enhanced Vision,Enhanced Sense of Smell ,Enhanced Hearing ,Dimensional Teleportation,Archery,Swordsmanship,Lassoing

name: Superman
occupation: Reporter for the Daily Planet and novelist
powers_short: Strength,Invulnerability,Longevity,Superhuman Stamina,Flight,Superhuman Speed,Superhuman Hearing,Healing Factor,Super Breath,Heat Vision,X-Ray Vision,Torquasm Rao

name: Hal Jordan
powers_short: Use of power ring grants numerous powers, including flight, invulnerability, omnilingualism,Energy Projection and the generation of hard-light constructs.

name: Flash
powers_short: Barry Allen is The Flash, the fastest man alive. Using his super-speed powers, he taps into the Speed Force and becomes a costumed crime-fighter. His position is a legacy in the Flash Family, successor to the original Jay Garrick and predecessor to Wally West.
